column2: RECODED MENTAL HEALTH SERVICES UTILIZATION
The following variable, as assigned a positive response if a respondent did not receive mental health treatment (MHTRTPY=0), and thought they
should get treatment but did not seek treatment. A negative response was assigned if a respondent met either of these conditions:
Did not receive mental health treatment (MHTRTPY=0) and sought treatment.
Did not receive mental health treatment (MHTRTPY=0) and did not think they should get treatment.
Len : 1    RC-THGHT SHOULD GET MH TRT, DIDNT RECV OR SEEK TRT- PST YR
he following variable, MHTSKTHPY, was assigned a positive response if a respondent met either of these conditions:
Did not receive mental health treatment (MHTRTPY=0) and sought treatment.
Did not receive mental health treatment (MHTRTPY=0), did not indicate they sought treatment, but did think they should get treatment.
negative response was assigned if a respondent did not receive mental health treatment (MHTRTPY=0), did not seek treatment, and did not think
